ref.mixed-citation: Carter, A. W., Sadd, B. M., Tuberville, T. D., Paitz, R. T. & Bowden, R. M. Short heatwaves during fluctuating incubation regimes produce females under temperature-dependent sex determination with implications for sex ratios in nature. Sci. Rep. 8, 10.1038/s41598-41017-17708-41590 (2018).
